name: Devil Daddy Descent
description:
Help Devil Daddy get down as deep as you can.
This is a turn-based side-scrolling shooter. When you move so does the world.
Made in 48 hours for L.I.C. Jam

How to play

Each turn you can move, shoot or bomb. Once you do your move, everybody takes a turn

ARROWS to MOVE

You can also jump with UP and fast fall with DOWN

BONK an enemy with your FEET to get them HOLD X and press an arrow to SHOOT

Mind your ammo!

HOLD Z and press an arrow to BOMB

Bombs destroy everything.

You start with one bomb but can get more.

Bestiary GoodiesCredits

Game by Andy Wallace

Made in Pico-8

Sprites from or based on Simple broad-purpose tileset by surt, Sharm & vk

What's L.I.C. Jam?

It's not really anything! My partner Jane Friedhoff and I just decided to spend the weekend making games!

This game is a little half-baked. It's glitchy and not always fun, but I think there's a cool system in here!

Play her game, DOG SIMULATOR 2K23! It is very fun and is definitely not a strategy game!
